entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
